text-snippet.content: You agree to indemnify CyberNet and all third parties that are linked to CyberNet and CyberNet's services, and all subsidiaries, affiliates, officers, agents, partners, and employees from any claims or demands made by any third party due to or arising from your use of CyberNet's services, purchase of materials from CyberNet or any third parties linked from CyberNet services, or use of any materials purchased or rented from CyberNet or third parties linked from CyberNet services.
